translations.text: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake
And the earth discharges its burdens<sup foot_note=197793>1</sup>
And man says,<sup foot_note=197794>1</sup> "What is [wrong] with it?" -
That Day, it will report its news
Because your Lord has inspired [i.e., commanded] it.
That Day, the people will depart<sup foot_note=197795>1</sup> separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.
So whoever does an atom's weight<sup foot_note=197796>1</sup> of good will see it,
And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.
